keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
map gn visitPreviousTab
unmap x
map xx removeTab
map xt closeTabsOnRight
map xT closeTabsOnLeft
searchEngines:
# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
# yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
ew: https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia (en)
rw: https://ru.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia (ru)
dw: https://de.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wikipedia (de)
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
ya: http://yandex.ru/yandsearch?text=%s Яндекс
ud: https://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=%s Urban Dictionary
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s YouTube
lw: http://lyrics.wikia.com/wiki/Special:Search?search=%s LyricWiki (en)
od: http://en.oxforddictionaries.com/definition/%s OxfordDictionary
cd: https://dictionary.cambridge.org/search/english/direct/?source=gadgets&q=%s Cambridge Dictionary
ke: https://en.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wiktionary (en)
kd: https://de.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wiktionary (de)
kr: https://ru.wiktionary.org/w/index.php?search=%s Wiktionary (ru)
ld: https://www.linguee.de/deutsch-englisch/search?il=DE&tool=opensearch&query=%s Linguee DE-EN
gr: http://gramota.ru/slovari/dic/?word=%s&all=x Грамота.Вопросы
md: https://www.macmillandictionary.com/search/british/direct/?q=%s Macmillan Dictionary british
rl: https://repology.org/projects/?search=%s Repology packages
so: https://stackoverflow.com/search?q=%s Stack Overflow
su: https://superuser.com/search?q=%s Super User
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=Everything Github
fv: https://forvo.com/search/%s Forvo
mtr: https://www.multitran.com/m.exe?s=%s&l1=2&l2=1 Multitran.ru
